metadata.Title: CVE-2015-0258 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Multiple incomplete blacklist vulnerabilities in the avatar upload functionality in manageuser.php in Collabtive before 2.1 allow remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary code by uploading a file with a (1) .php3, (2) .php4, (3) .php5, or (4) .phtml extension.

criterions.comment: collabtive: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
